column4: Hello. Help me please. I wanna to make Kubuntu from my ubuntu. I made sudo aptitude install kubuntu-desktop, but how to deinstall ubuntu-packages? Or there is another way to "clean" change?
not a great idea to use aptitude to install meta packages
there is no explicit way to do it

I wrote a script once that compared the two meta packages and determined the difference in packages and removed those packages which were different, it should still work, it is buried in the forums somewhere though
